detail_desc: Long-sleeved, polo-neck top in stretch viscose jersey with a slight sheen. Straight-cut hem.
Hat in a soft, fine knit with an appliqué on the turned-up edge.
Calf-length skirt in a smocked weave that is fitted down to the knee and finishes in a wide flounce. High waist with wide, covered elastication. Unlined.
Baby Exclusive. Long-sleeved Henley top in organic cotton slub jersey with a button placket and a woven yoke.
Cropped, fitted top in cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps.
5-pocket low-rise jeans in washed denim with hard-worn details, a button fly and slightly wider, tapered legs.

Short dress in jersey crêpe with a collar, decorative opening at the front and an opening with buttons at the back of the neck. Elasticated seam at the waist and 3/4-length sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Unlined.
Striped court shoes in cotton canvas with pointed toes, a decorative bow on the front and covered heels. Satin linings, imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel 8 cm.

department_name: Sneakers big girl inactive from s2
detail_desc: Hi-tops with lacing and faux fur pompoms at the front and a zip in the side. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim in a relaxed fit with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and tapered legs.
Pyjamas in soft, printed cotton jersey. Short-sleeved top with a rounded hem. Shorts with an elasticated waist.
Short, straight-style T-shirt dress in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with a round, slightly wider neckline. Short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and short slits in the sides. Unlined.
T-shirt in slub jersey made from a modal and cotton blend with a round neckline and straight-cut hem.
Small shoulder bag in imitation leather with a zip at the top, a quilted front with studs and a shoulder strap with a press-stud at one end. Lined. Size 5x11x16 cm.
Bikini briefs in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with an elasticated mid waist, lined gusset, wrapover sections at the front of the sides and medium coverage at the back.
Popover jacket in woven fabric with a drawstring hood and zip at the top. Large front pocket with a concealed zip, and elastication at the cuffs. Mesh lining.

Set with a top, cycling shorts and hairband in soft cotton. Sleeveless top in woven fabric with narrow shoulder straps, elastication at the top and a flounced trim at the front. Shorts in jersey with an elasticated waist. Jersey hairband with a decorative bow at the front.
Short, wide top in soft, printed jersey with dropped shoulders and short, wide sleeves.
Fitted, short-sleeved top in soft jersey with a collar, buttons down the front and overlocked edges around the sleeves and hem.
5-pocket jeans in washed denim with a regular waist, button fly and slim, straight legs.
Off-the-shoulder playsuit in woven fabric with elastication around the top and short sleeves with ties. Elasticated seam at the waist and side pockets.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim in a relaxed fit with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and tapered legs. Soft jersey lining for extra warmth.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with sequins on the front and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Short dress in woven fabric with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Narrow, detachable belt at the waist and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Unlined.
Shorts in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric. Ribbed, elasticated, drawstring waist and contrasting colour trims down the sides and at the hems.
Long-sleeved jumper in fine-knit cotton with a sequin motif on the front, slits in the sides and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Tights in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Short, fitted, sleeveless dress in sturdy, patterned jersey.
T-shirt in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with a round, ribbed neckline.

Super push-up lace bra with underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.
Short chino shorts in washed cotton poplin with a zip fly and button, side pockets and jetted back pockets with a button. Slim fit.
Jumper knitted in a cotton-blend with a cable-knit front and ribbing around the cuffs and hem.
Shorts in lightweight, patterned organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with a ribbed, drawstring waist.
Fitted tops in soft jersey with short sleeves and gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy. The cotton content of the tops is organic.
Imitation leather wallet with a zip around the top, five card slots and a zipped coin compartment. Lined. Size 2x10x11.5 cm.
Denim shirt with a turn-down collar, classic front and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Yoke at the back, open chest pockets with a button, and a rounded hem.
Straight-cut T-shirt in viscose jersey with a sheen, with a wide neckline and low dropped shoulders.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with wide elastication and a drawstring at the waist, and side pockets. Soft brushed inside.
Scarf in a soft, patterned weave. Size 60x200 cm.
Short skirt in stretch twill with a concealed zip in the side, buttons down the front and small slit at the front. Lined.
Narrow waist belt in imitation leather with studs, a decorative bow at the front and adjustable fastening at the back. Width 1 cm.
Shorts in washed stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y) and zip fly and button. Fake front pockets, real back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Jacket in twill containing some wool with a stand-up collar with a tab and press-studs. Zip, flap side pockets with a press-stud and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar and button placket.
Oversized, off-the-shoulder jumper in a soft fine knit with a jacquard-patterned, double-layered neckline, long sleeves and wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Top in viscose jersey with short, flounced sleeves and a straight hem with short slits in the sides.
Playsuit in a viscose weave with a V-neck, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, an elasticated seam at the waist and front pockets.
Jacket in soft faux shearling with contrasting colour details. Stand-up collar, a zip down the front with a chin guard, and front pockets. Rounded and slightly longer at the back. Partly lined.
Straight-cut T-shirt in fine-knit cotton and silk in a relaxed fit with slits in the sides.
Calf-length dress in jersey crêpe with a V-neck, narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a draped wrapover front with ties at one side.

Pull-on joggers in stretch, supersoft denim in a loose fit with an elasticated, drawstring waist and fake fly. Patch front pockets, a flap back pocket with a hook and loop fastening, and legs with elasticated hems.
Vest top in soft jersey.
Fitted, off-the-shoulder top in jersey with a gentle V-neck and long sleeves.
Poncho in a soft, fine knit with a rib-knit polo neck.
5-pocket low-rise jeans in stretch denim with a zip fly and super-skinny legs.

Knee-length, off-the-shoulder dress in jersey crêpe with elastication around the neckline, 3/4-length sleeves with a wide flounce at the cuff, a seam at the waist and a concealed zip at the back. Unlined.
Sleeveless dress in tulle with sequins and appliqués. Buttons at the back, a seam at the waist and an asymmetric hem. Satin lining.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft, ribbed organic cotton jersey with lapped shoulders and press-studs at the crotch.
Hi-tops in imitation leather with a lightly padded edge and tongue, elasticated lacing at the front and an adjustable hook and loop tab. Soft pile linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Pyjama bottoms in lightweight fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Leather belt with an antiqued metal buckle. Width approx. 3.5 cm.
Trainers in patterned canvas with an elastic gore at the front. Canvas linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Double-breasted coat in soft fabric with wide shawl lapels and concealed press-studs down the front. One inner pocket, a tab at the back and an asymmetric hem. Lined.
Short-sleeved sports top in airy, organic cotton jersey with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Lace corset with underwired, padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Support panels in the sides and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Fine-knit tights in a soft cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Long jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with a ribbed polo neck, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem and high slits in the sides. Longer at the back. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Running top in fast-drying functional fabric with short raglan sleeves and reflective details. Slightly longer and rounded at the back.
Captain’s cap with a band at the front. Lined.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey.

Airy blouse in a Tencel™ lyocell and silk weave with a deep V-neck with pleats at the top and covered buttons down the front. Puff sleeves with lightly tulle-padded shoulders for a more defined silhouette. Tapered waist with a seam and flared peplum, and gathers at the back.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Wide trousers in a patterned crêpe weave with a high waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Belt with a metal buckle and a cut-out section at the back of the waist. Side pockets, a welt back pocket and straight-cut legs with a seam at the front and flare at the hems.
Jumper in a soft, textured cashmere knit with a V-neck and dropped shoulders.
Metal earrings in various sizes and designs. 23 pairs of studs and two pairs of hoops, one with rod-shaped pendants. Size from 0.2 cm to 5 cm.
Jumper in a soft, fine cotton knit with long sleeves, a small sequined appliqué on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Lightly padded jacket in a glossy weave with a small, rib-trimmed stand-up collar and appliqué at the top. Press-studs down the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
5-pocket knee-length shorts in washed denim with hard-worn details, a regular waist and button fly.
Long-sleeved jumper knitted in a soft, fine cotton blend with a motif, buttons on one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
NATHALIE LÉTÉ x H&M. Trainers in patterned cotton canvas with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Canvas linings and insoles and fluted rubber soles.
